Posted By: Sulphite (2/7/2012 12:09:08 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I like how the one person I generally disagree with (Majinara) is the only one that made some really good points about this card.
  
   
You guys are underestimating this card, I myself underestimated it until I tried it out. Just because it doesn't do something amazing or win you the game doesn't mean it's terrible or the creators are designing it badly. Yeah it's not BS (baneslayer), but what if everything was?
  
   
Any permanent that allows you to sacrifice things for free with a cost of two mana or less is good in my book. It is very quite often when I am playing black that I would much prefer to put my creatures into the graveyard (where I can get them back later) rather than have them exiled. This plus a 2/1 that flies on occaision in two awesome card types makes this very quite playable for me. I like the design, I like the flavor, I like the abiltiy.
  
   
5/5
posts.html:
I like how the one person I generally disagree with (Majinara) is the only one that made some really good points about this card.

You guys are underestimating this card, I myself underestimated it until I tried it out. Just because it doesn't do something amazing or win you the game doesn't mean it's terrible or the creators are designing it badly. Yeah it's not BS (baneslayer), but what if everything was?

Any permanent that allows you to sacrifice things for free with a cost of two mana or less is good in my book. It is very quite often when I am playing black that I would much prefer to put my creatures into the graveyard (where I can get them back later) rather than have them exiled. This plus a 2/1 that flies on occaision in two awesome card types makes this very quite playable for me. I like the design, I like the flavor, I like the abiltiy.

5/5

posts.post_content: Woah that card ain't that bad actually. Two power for two mana is fine, it's immune to lots of black removal ("destroy target nonblack"), and it got evasion!
